Customization.Description: Customize UE5's layout, keybindings, and functionality to suit workflows.

Features.Overview: UE5 allows custom layouts, color schemes, keyboard shortcuts, and plugin functionality.

EditorPreferences.Description: Configure editor behavior for controls, viewports, and source control.

Plugins.Overview: Plugins add specific functionality to UE without modifying core code.

Steps: Go to Edit > Plugins.
Find and select the plugin.
Check the box to enable it.
Save and restart UE.
EnablePlugin.Notes: Beta plugins may show a warning.

Steps: Go to Edit > Plugins.
Find and select the plugin.
Uncheck the box to disable it.
Save and restart UE.
DisablePlugin.Notes: Disabling a dependent plugin might affect functionality.

Steps: In Epic Games Launcher, go to Marketplace.
Search and add the plugin to cart.
Checkout and go to the plugin page.
Click Install to Engine.
Select the engine version and install.
Open UE and enable the plugin.

KeyboardShortcuts.Overview: Configure keybinds for commands to suit workflows.
KeyboardShortcuts.Access: Go to Edit > Editor Preferences > Keyboard Shortcuts.

Commands.Grouping: Commands are grouped by functional area.
Commands.Bindings: Each command can have up to two shortcuts.

Steps: Click inside the text field for the command.
Press the desired key combination.
Click outside the text field to save.
CreateShortcut.Notes: Warnings appear for conflicts; use Override to resolve.

Steps: Click the Delete (X) button next to the shortcut.

ExportSteps: Click the Export button at the top of the Keyboard Shortcuts editor.
ImportSteps: Click the Import button at the top of the Keyboard Shortcuts editor.

EditorPreferences.Overview: Modify settings for controls, viewports, source control, auto-saving, and more.

Options: Use WASD Only When Right Mouse Button is Held
Never Use WASD for Camera Controls
FlightCameraControl.Description: Sets how the flight camera is controlled.

Viewports.GrabAndDrag: Enables scrolling camera with mouse drag in orthographic viewports.
Viewports.LinkOrthographicMovement: Link orthographic viewports to move together.

AspectRatioConstraint.Description: Controls FOV axis for aspect ratio.

Viewports.MouseScrollSpeed: Adjusts perspective camera speed with mouse.

LookAndFeel.HighlightObjects: Highlights objects under cursor in viewports.

LevelEditing.PreserveActorScale: Keeps original actor scale on replace.

SourceControl.PromptCheckout: Prompts for SCC checkout on package modification.
SourceControl.AddNewFiles: Auto-adds new files to source control.

Settings.Host: Source control server host and port.

Particles.UseCurves: Uses curves for distributions instead of lookup tables.

Privacy.CrashReports: Generates crash reports on engine crashes.

Steps: Go to Edit > Editor Preferences.
Scroll to Privacy category.
Click Bug Reports and select Don't Send.
Scroll to Privacy category.
Click Usage Data and select Don't Send.
